com.dukascopy.api.chart.mouse

Interface IChartPanelMouseListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChartPanelMouseAdapter

    public interface IChartPanelMouseListener
    The listener interface for receiving chart panel mouse events.
    See Also:
    ChartPanelMouseAdapter, ChartPanelMouseEvent

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mouseClicked(IChartPanelMouseEvent e)
      Invoked when the mouse button has been clicked (pressed and released) on a chart panel.
      void mouseDragged(IChartPanelMouseEvent e)
      Invoked when a mouse button is pressed on a chart panel and then dragged.
      void mouseEntered(IChartPanelMouseEvent e)
      Invoked when the mouse enters a chart panel.
      void mouseExited(IChartPanelMouseEvent e)
      Invoked when the mouse exits a chart panel.
      void mouseMoved(IChartPanelMouseEvent e)
      Invoked when the mouse cursor has been moved onto a chart panel but no buttons have been pushed.
      void mousePressed(IChartPanelMouseEvent e)
      Invoked when a mouse button has been pressed on a chart panel.
      void mouseReleased(IChartPanelMouseEvent e)
      Invoked when a mouse button has been released on a chart panel.

    • Method Detail

      • mouseClicked

        void mouseClicked(IChartPanelMouseEvent e)
        Invoked when the mouse button has been clicked (pressed and released) on a chart panel.

      • mousePressed

        void mousePressed(IChartPanelMouseEvent e)
        Invoked when a mouse button has been pressed on a chart panel.

      • mouseReleased

        void mouseReleased(IChartPanelMouseEvent e)
        Invoked when a mouse button has been released on a chart panel.

      • mouseEntered

        void mouseEntered(IChartPanelMouseEvent e)
        Invoked when the mouse enters a chart panel.

      • mouseExited

        void mouseExited(IChartPanelMouseEvent e)
        Invoked when the mouse exits a chart panel.

      • mouseDragged

        void mouseDragged(IChartPanelMouseEvent e)
        Invoked when a mouse button is pressed on a chart panel and then dragged. MOUSE_DRAGGED events will continue to be delivered to the chart panel where the drag originated until the mouse button is released (regardless of whether the mouse position is within the bounds of the component).

      • mouseMoved

        void mouseMoved(IChartPanelMouseEvent e)
        Invoked when the mouse cursor has been moved onto a chart panel but no buttons have been pushed.
